title: UN says 'no postponement' of Syria talks
title_page: UN says 'no postponement' of Syria talks | Daily Mail Online
text:
UN says 'no postponement' of Syria talks
The UN said Thursday that there was no postponement of Syria peace talks due to start Friday in Geneva, despite uncertainty around whether the main opposition umbrella group would attend.
There is "no postponement from our side," Khawla Mattar, spokeswoman for the talks, told AFP as the High Negotiations Committee -- formed last month in an effort to unite Syria's fractious opposition -- said it was waiting for answers from the United Nations before agreeing to attend.
